Photo / Warren Buckland

James Parlane: Ex-Waipā councillor and colourful character dies in crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/james-parlane-ex-waipa-councillor-and-colourful-character-dies-in-crash/Z33NLOAUXVGSHLGSJZES44LN2I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/james-parlane-ex-waipa-councillor-and-colourful-character-dies-in-crash/Z33NLOAUXVGSHLGSJZES44LN2I/ Dean TaylorFamily grieve loss of larger-than-life character and lawyer. Missing Sandringham man Ronny Okeke: Auckland police search properties https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-sandringham-man-ronny-okeke-auckland-police-search-properties/TOFNLCT7EBD5NO2U7AOISPJB3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-sandringham-man-ronny-okeke-auckland-police-search-properties/TOFNLCT7EBD5NO2U7AOISPJB3Q/ Raphael FranksRonny Okeke has been missing for 31 days now. 'His family deserve answers,' police say. Tue, 28 May 2024 05:01:12 +0000 Ronny Okeke, 60, was last seen walking out of New World Mt Roskill on April 27. Earlier that day he had tried phoning his wife overseas. Okeke was then reported missing on May 3. Photo / NZ Police
Taranaki mattress murder trial: Leigh Beer allegedly set fire to his partner’s bed, walked away https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-trial-leigh-beer-allegedly-set-fire-to-his-partners-bed-walked-away/EHPRYNREOJGE7JHHUULEYYOC3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-trial-leigh-beer-allegedly-set-fire-to-his-partners-bed-walked-away/EHPRYNREOJGE7JHHUULEYYOC3E/ Tara ShaskeyThe 21yo was alive but likely unconscious when her bedroom was engulfed in flames. Tue, 28 May 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Emma Field's body was found following a fire that ripped through her New Plymouth flat on May 27, 2022. Now, her partner Leigh Matthew Frederick Beer is on trial for her alleged murder and arson.

Parole declined: Christchurch’s Edgeware Rd murderer Lipine Sila to stay behind bars for a ‘long, long time’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/parole-declined-christchurchs-edgeware-rd-murderer-lipine-sila-to-stay-behind-bars-for-a-long-long-time/UUAOEGXJBJBOJK5GQDSJU4BDIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/parole-declined-christchurchs-edgeware-rd-murderer-lipine-sila-to-stay-behind-bars-for-a-long-long-time/UUAOEGXJBJBOJK5GQDSJU4BDIU/ Anna LeaskLipine Sila has made little progress in the 17 years he's been in jail, says Parole Board.
